Detailed Description

Main frame for Blokus.

Main window. Contains Rules and Game for gameplay mechanics. A FieldPanel, and a few instances of TilePanel show the previous, current and next Tile. This frame also handles key events from child windows and have a couple of commands from menus that allows players save, load, skip one's turn etc.
